name: The Cold Night (Steffo, MaxSensei, xZefyr, Cookie_CHR)
name_original: The Cold Night (Steffo, MaxSensei, xZefyr, Cookie_CHR)
description:
It's a cold night. Evil lurks in the shadows. 

Luckily you've managed to set up a fire. 
The flames dim with each passing moment, plunging you deeper into the darkness. You must gather wood in order to protect your only source of warmth and light.  

But trying to do so... is just delaying the inevitable.

You play as Patrizio Pulpito, a lumberjack hipster and hoverboard enthusiast.

Try not to die against hordes of snowmen, and keep your fire alive to avoid awakening the ancient evil!

  (Which is not actually in the game because we ran out of time. Oops.)

Power-ups
  •   Branch: **Keep your fire alive!**
  • Mega Arrow: **Pierce through enemies!**  
  • Crossbow: **Shoot faster!**
Controls
  • Scoot around with **WASD** or **←↓↑→**
  • Aiming with the **Mouse Cursor**
  • Shoot with the **Left Mouse Button**
